ComicInfo.Title: Shadows of the Past
ComicInfo.Summary: Shadows of the Past: Tony constructs a piece of defensive armor for Thor's broken arm. Loki and Hela plot to bring Thor down. Thor begins finding and attacking old foes that shortly dissolve into everyday people.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:38:41. [Issue ID 42400]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Frost Giants,Wrecker II,Loki,Balder,Hildy,Kevin,Asgard Kids,Enchantress,Heimdall,Thor,Hogun,Hela,Utgard-Loki,Volstagg,Mick,Absorbing Man,Fandral,Tony Stark [Iron Man]
